about_the_game:
Experience Realistic Immersion

Delve into a realm of lifelike visuals and sounds with a clean user interface, guaranteeing an immersive experience that will keep you entertained.

Encounter Distinctive Spirits

Discover 10 distinct types of ghosts, each with unique characteristics, personalities, and capabilities, ensuring every investigation presents a fresh challenge.

Manage Your Power

Managing and overseeing the power distribution within the building is pivotal for survival. Operate the fuse box to control the power supply, which only sustains one room at a time.

Maintain Your Sanity

Prolonged exposure to darkness and encounters with the supernatural can overwhelm your sanity. Witnessing or hearing eerie phenomena can drive you to the brink of madness. A significant loss of sanity may prove fatal.

Journey into the Haunted Depths

Embark on a journey through the haunted St. Valentine's location, filled with unique twists, secret hiding spots, and intricate layouts.

Modes for Every Player

With four challenging difficulty levels and assorted trials, there are plenty of ways to test your skills, each mode offering distinctive rewards.

Unearth the Archives

Progress through the game to unlock historical archives, unravel the tales of lore, and delve into the mysteries of the past.

Become the Phantom Watcher

Every ghost you conquer is a step forward. The experience points you earn allow you to progress through various ranks, each more prestigious than the last. Your journey culminates in the ultimate achievement: the esteemed rank of “Phantom Watcher."

content_descriptors.notes: The Ghost model in the game is very detailed with it's skull falling out from the head. Minimal blood on the character but bone exposure is present.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Phantom Watcher is a chilling horror-strategy game. Survive the haunted hospital’s mysteries, navigating ghostly behaviors in a unique CRT aesthetic. Each playthrough is a new eerie challenge. Dare to uncover the secrets?
